timestamp.description: The number of milliseconds since the UNIX epoch (January 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC).

tree_size.description: The number of entries that are stored in the log's Merkle tree.

root_hash.description: The log's Merkle tree root hash in base64.

key_hash.description: A public verification-key hash that identifies the signer in base64.

signature.description: The signer's signature over the log's tree_leaf structure in base64.
